title: Novel CO2-philic porous organic polymers synthesized in water: a leap towards eco-sustainability
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00479E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Riccardo Mobili, Yue Wu, Charl Xavier Bezuidenhout, Sonia La Cognata, Silvia Bracco, Mariolino Carta, Valeria Amendola
β-Keto-enamine POPs, synthesized in water at relatively low temperatures, without catalysts, and using common glassware, exhibit a competitive adsorption capacity and high selectivity for CO2 over N2 at 298 K (1 bar).
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
